product_name: Avid BB7 Mountain Disc Brake - 160mm rotor
long_description: With gobs of beautifully modulated power and intuitive easy-to-use adjustability, the Avid BB7 Mountain disc brake sets the standard in the realm of mechanical disc brakes.
short_description: With gobs of beautifully modulated power and intuitive easy-to-use adjustability, the Avid BB7 Mountain disc brake sets the standard in the realm of mechanical disc brakes.
